mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (status, quantity, last_Update) VALUES (#{status}, #{quantity}, #{lastUpdate});
mapper.select: SELECT ODR.id, OFC.office_name, M.menuName, ODR.quantity, S.is_use, ODR.`status` FROM orders ODR JOIN stock S ON ODR.id = S.order_id JOIN office OFC ON S.office_id = OFC.id JOIN menu M ON S.menu_id = M.id
